title: LinkedIn Sales Navigator AI ICP Lead Extractor - Input Configuration

icp_description.title: Ideal Customer Profile (ICP) Description
icp_description.description: Describe your perfect customer in detail. Our AI will score every lead against this profile. Example: 'B2B SaaS founders in US with 50-200 employees, using HubSpot, interested in AI automation'
icp_description.prefill: Founders and CEOs at B2B SaaS startups in the United States with 11-200 employees, currently using CRM tools like HubSpot or Salesforce, interested in sales automation and AI-powered lead generation.

job_titles.title: Target Job Titles (Required)
job_titles.description: LinkedIn job titles to target. Be specific! Examples: 'CEO', 'Founder', 'VP of Marketing', 'Head of Sales', 'Chief Technology Officer'

locations.title: Locations (Optional)
locations.description: Geographic locations to target. Examples: 'United States', 'California', 'San Francisco', 'New York'

keywords_include.title: Keywords to Include (Optional)
keywords_include.description: Keywords that must appear in profiles. Examples: 'AI', 'automation', 'CRM', 'B2B'

max_raw_leads.title: Max Raw Leads to Search
max_raw_leads.description: How many leads to initially search before AI filters them. Higher = more comprehensive but slower. HARD CAP: 1000 leads.

top_n.title: Top ICP-Matched Leads to Return
top_n.description: After AI scoring, return only the TOP N best-fit leads. These are your highest-quality prospects. HARD CAP: 500 leads.
